title: WTB: Mathewson Portrait or White Cap
author: Tripp Trapp

posts.post_title: WTB: Mathewson Portrait or White Cap
posts.post_content:
Hello,

Looking to buy a Mathewson portrait or white cap in a PSA 4 or 4.5 (common back). If you have one you’re willing to part with, please send photos and price to: [url]jennings.eric@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks,
Eric
